subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees pitcher Carl Pavano has not pitched since June 27, 2005, because of an absurd sequence of injuries, and he has been ignored throughout the clubhouse for failing to disclose he was in a car accident last season.
snippet: Yankees pitcher Carl Pavano has not pitched since June 27, 2005, because of an absurd sequence of injuries, and he has been ignored throughout the clubhouse for failing to disclose he was in a car accident last season.
